$ul: **api_key_id**: Reference to the static API key (/api/keys) used to authenticate this request (when auth_method=static_api_key)
**auth_method**: What kind of authentication was used
**authenticated**: Whether or not you are authenticated
**mutate**: Whether or not this session can mutate resources
**user_id**: Reference to the user account (/api/users) used to authenticate this request (when auth_method=user_session)
